tier_c_exclusion.rule: Tier-C slots MUST NOT appear in comparison table
tier_c_exclusion.evidence: Slots contain only: entry_age, exclusions, mandatory_dependency, payout_limit, reduction, start_date, waiting_period

tier_b_suffix.rule: Tier-B slots MUST have '(상품 기준)' suffix
tier_b_suffix.evidence: entry_age values include suffix: '5, 3, 6 (상품 기준)', '90, 1, 10 (상품 기준)', etc.

tier_a_g5_fail.rule: Tier-A slots with G5 FAIL MUST have null value
tier_a_g5_fail.evidence: All G5 Gate failures show value: null

sample_cases.notes: G5 Gate: 다른 담보 값 혼입
G5 Gate: 담보 귀속 확인 불가
G5 Gate: 다른 담보 값 혼입

tier_a_g5_fail.command: cat data/compare_v1/compare_rows_v1.jsonl | jq 'select(.slots.payout_limit.notes | contains("G5 Gate")) | {coverage: .identity.coverage_title, value: .slots.payout_limit.value, notes: .slots.payout_limit.notes}'

unknown_display_consistency.rule: UNKNOWN values MUST display as null (not forbidden phrases)
unknown_display_consistency.evidence: All UNKNOWN cases show value: null, no forbidden phrases found
unknown_display_consistency.command: grep -E '(값 정규화 실패|근거 있음|추출 실패)' data/compare_v1/compare_rows_v1.jsonl
